data.description: StockBuilder lets you invest in your breeding stock over a three-year term – using the equity in your livestock for security. You can re-build numbers, and improve the quality of your breeding stock.
data.name: StockBuilder

fees.name: Foreign currency conversion fee
fees.additionalInfo: A foreign currency conversion fee of 2% of the Australian dollar amount applies when a purchase or cash advance is performed in a foreign currency. Note: the International Visa cash advance fee also applies for cards used overseas

fees.name: Bank cheque fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per bank cheque you request. Bank cheques are organised through Bendigo Bank

fees.name: Bank cheque repurchase or stop fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per bank cheque you request to be repurchased or stopped

fees.name: Special clearance of a cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request fast clearance of a cheque drawn on an Australian bank deposited into your account

fees.name: Single cheque encashment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each cheque you ask us to arrange to be cashed at a branch of another financial institution

fees.name: Real time electronic or international funds transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Applies the same day you request a transfer to an account at another financial institution in Australia, or an international funds transfer

fees.name: Outward cheque dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per cheque written on your account that is dishonoured due to insufficient funds

fees.name: Direct debit dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per unsuccessful direct debit attempt on your account due to insufficient funds

fees.name: Copy of a cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per cheque when you request a copy of a cheque deposited to your account

fees.name: Electronic or cheque trace
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request to trace a Bpay®, Pay Anyone (including Osko®) or other transaction sent electronically to another financial institution or a cheque written on your account. A copy of the cheque is provided with this request. The trace fee will be waived if the trace reveals an error by Rural Bank

fees.name: Real time electronic or international funds trace
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request. Note: The receiving bank may also impose a fee. The trace fee will be waived if the trace reveals an error by Rural Bank

fees.name: Electronic recall
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per attempt to recall an electronic transaction. The fee is charged even if the recall is unsuccessful

fees.name: Audit request
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per audit requested on an account

fees.name: Transaction history record
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request per statement period for a transaction history print out on an account

fees.name: Company search fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a company search is required to establish an account

fees.name: Business name search fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a business name search is required to establish an account

fees.name: Administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: An administration fee of $15.00 per 1/4 hour applies for the supply of information, retrieval of a voucher or other documentation, or other special services you request

fees.name: Dormant account
fees.additionalInfo: Charged annually to accounts that have not had a customer initiated deposit or withdrawal for 3 years or more

fees.name: Loan establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Available on application. This fee is based on the amount of the lending facility approved by Rural Bank at the time the application is made

fees.name: Loan commitment fee
fees.additionalInfo: A loan commitment fee of 1.5% p.a. is payable if facilities are not drawn or rejected by the customer within 30 days of written approval advice. Fee is calculated daily on the approved amount

fees.name: Undrawn loan fee
fees.additionalInfo: An undrawn loan fee of 0.2% per month is payable on any part of a fixed rate loan not drawn down by the end of the drawdown period

fees.name: Security documentation and legal fees
fees.additionalInfo: Vary based on the complexity of the facility and securities. Customers are required to pay all costs associated with the preparation, certification, registration and settlement of security documents and/or bank guarantees and all costs related to preparation of facilities including for Trusts and/or non-personal entities. Search fees, trust perusal fees, government stamp duty and registration fees may also apply

fees.name: Valuation fees
fees.additionalInfo: Vary based on the nature and value of the security. Customers are required to pay all costs associated with the valuation of assets offered as security

fees.name: Trust Perusal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per perusal to ensure trustee has all necessary powers to enter into the proposed transaction

fees.name: Rate lock fee
fees.additionalInfo: Available on application. Payable for us to lock in and hold a fixed rate more than 14 days prior to drawdown

fees.name: Facility increase fee
fees.additionalInfo: A minimum fee of $250 based on the amount of the increase approved by Rural Bank at the time the application is made

fees.name: Loan variation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request a change to a loan facility (such as if you change from one loan type to another, convert from a variable rate to a fixed rate, or ask us to review your interest rate)

fees.name: Partial Loan Draw Down Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per partial draw down to cover the administration required to manage approval and draw down. Progress Inspection fees may also be payable

fees.name: Security handling, perusal and consent fee
fees.additionalInfo: A security handling, perusal and consent fee of $250 per dealing applies each time we need to deal with a security after settlement such as production of title or if we peruse and approve a tenancy agreement, subdivision, strata plan and other document where we hold a mortgage over a security. Where an external agent is used by us to carry out the work, their fee will also be payable by you

fees.name: Settlement and Agency fee
fees.additionalInfo: These fees will be payable if settlement or lodgement is required to be attended by a third party. Any such fees will be payable at or prior to the first advance

fees.name: Full/partial discharge
fees.additionalInfo: A fee of $150 per security up to a maximum of $600 is charged for the preparation and execution of discharge, and in the case of full discharges, calculation of payout figures, attendance to settlement and account closure. Government fees may also apply. Where an external agent is used by us to carry out the work, their fee will also be payable by you

fees.name: Partial release of a Security Interest
fees.additionalInfo: A fee of $60 per security up to a maximum of $180 applies

fees.name: Break cost administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you repay all or part of your term loan during a fixed rate period

eligibility.additionalInfo: Not available to heritage Rural Finance customers
Evidence of livestock purchase required prior to loan drawdown
Livestock trading schedule and forecast income for 3 years must be provided

features.additionalInfo: Competitive interest rates with either a variable rate or the option of a three year fixed interest rate
Interest-only payments in the first year
Flexible repayments that suit your cash flow in the second and third years (some principal must by paid by 24th month, and loan must be paid in full by end of 36th month)
